name: search-menu-ui
description: Search UI written in vanilla JavaScript. Menu structure for results. Filters are integrated as search results.

scripts.devbuild: rm -rf devdist && NODE_ENV=development parcel build --dist-dir devdist ./src/js/*.js --no-optimize --no-source-maps --no-content-hash --detailed-report
scripts.package: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run coverage-badge && npm run doc && npm run devbuild && npm run build && merger
scripts.all: npm run package && cd example && npm run package

author: JohT
